Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires that digital coupons are made available to consumers in paper form of identical value
Summary: Requires that digital coupons are made available to consumers in paper form of identical value; provides for violations and penalties.
LawCode: Add ยง396-oo, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring that digital coupons are made available to consumers in paper form of identical value
